channel.description: Latest updates from the Ricci Lab

item.title: HDR of Karl Vivot
item.description: After receiving a CRCN position at Inserm, Karl will defend his habilitation in autumn of this year.

item.title: Minisymposium at IGBMC
item.description: On the day of Karl's HDR defense, we organize a minisymposium with committee members at the IGBMC.

item.title: Chaire d'excellence France 2030
item.description: Romeo Ricci has been awarded a Chair of Excellence for his ENDOFLAMMASOME project.
